code: @Bean public KStream<Integer, String> kStream(StreamsBuilder streamsBuilder) {     KStream<Integer, String> stream = streamsBuilder.stream("ks1In").     stream.map((k, v) -> new KeyValue<>(k, v.toUpperCase())).to("ks1Out", Produced.with(Serdes.Integer(), new JsonSerde<>())).     return stream. }
